profile.greeting: Welcome to Chappy Police Man, {{user_first_name}}! Click to start sending your police reports.

get_started.welcome: Hello, {{userFirstName}}! My name is Chappy Police Man, now you can send me your police reports.
get_started.guidance: Don't worry we are here to help you in the shortest possible time.
get_started.input_select: Please select the type of complaint you wish to report.
get_started.help: How can we help you today?
get_started.input_dni: Please enter your identification number or ID
get_started.input_addres_complaint: Please enter the address where the crime occurred
get_started.input_attachment_photo_solitude: Please attach a picture of you
get_started.input_security: Identity verification: Please enter the following combination, your father's mother's last name and your mother's year of birth

complaints1flow.features_confirmation1: The option you chose was Theft. Is it correct?

complaints2flow.features_confirmation2: The option you chose was Assault. Is it correct?

complaints3flow.features_confirmation3: The option you chose was Aggression. Is it correct?

complaints4flow.features_confirmation4: The option you chose was Extortion. Is it correct?

leadgen.promo: Hello, {{userFirstName}}. Now finding great clothes is easier and convenient.
leadgen.title: 50% discount coupon
leadgen.subtitle: Here is your coupon
leadgen.coupon: Your coupon was added to this conversation; now you can check out the discounted summer collection

curation.prompt: Are you looking for clothes for yourself or someone else?
curation.occasion: Great! Let's start. First, are you looking for clothes for a special occasion?
curation.price: How much do you want to spend?
curation.title: Summer 2019 Collection
curation.subtitle: Featured clothing

order.prompt: We will be happy to help you. Select one of the following options
order.number: Of course, write the order number
order.status: Your order is on its way, expect to receive it in three days.

care.prompt: To connect with the correct equipment, tell me what it is.
care.issue: Hi, {{userFirstName}}. My name is {{agentFirstName}} and I'm here to help you with any questions you have about {{topic}}.
care.default: Hi, {{userFirstName}}. My name is {{agentFirstName}} and I'm here to help you. How can I help you?
care.style: Hi, {{userFirstName}}. My name is {{agentFirstName}} and I'm here to answer any questions you may have about our summer styles.
care.end: Here ends the demo. Take advantage of the effectiveness of the Messenger platform for your business. Visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc to learn how to create a similar experience

survey.prompt: Hello, I want to know your opinion about your recent experience with {{agentFirstName}}
survey.neutral: Thank you for your opinion; if you think there is something we should improve, send us a comment with the hashtag #sugrencia
survey.negative: Thank you for letting us know. We are sorry for what happened, tell us if there is anything we can do to improve the situation
survey.suggestion: We received your suggestion and the team will review it soon. If you need to receive an answer about this now, send a comment with the word "help"

chat_plugin.prompt: Thank you for visiting our store, be sure to see all the excellent styles we have in the summer section.

fallback.attachment: Thank you for sending this attachment; now we can contact an agent to review it or you can start over
fallback.birthday: Please enter your birth date DD/MM/AA
fallback.wrong: The information entered is invalid. Please try again.
fallback.dni: Nice to meet you "{{message}}". Please enter the ID number
fallback.photoquestion: Please attach a photograph of you, if possible take the photo now or include a current one. You must distinguish your ears, face and neck.
fallback.when: Let's go well, now tell me. When did the events happen? DD / MM / AA HH: MM
fallback.pickpersontarget: Please choose one of the following options
fallback.worry: Don't worry, we are here to help you in the shortest possible time.
fallback.picktypecomplaints: Please select the type of complaint you wish to report.
fallback.correct_option: Quiet, we are very sorry for what happened to you. Now I will need some information to start your complaint.
fallback.requestdata: I will need some information to start your complaint
fallback.reviewinputdata: Please check the data entered are correct?
fallback.datefact: Let's go well, now tell me, when did the events occur? DD / MM / AA HH: MM
fallback.scenefact: Where did it happen? Please try to be specific.
fallback.specificfact: Tell me how it happened? Try to include the following information:
fallback.questionvidence: Do you want to attach any evidence?
fallback.attachevidence: Please attach the photo / document of the evidence.
fallback.details1: Details of victims and criminals, information on stolen objects.
fallback.details2: Details of victims and criminals, of weapons used and of stolen objects.
fallback.details3: Details of the aggressors and the weapons used
fallback.recomendation1: I understand we regret what happened, remember that in order to safeguard your integrity, you should not put resistance against theft.
fallback.recomendation2: Please if you suffered any kind of damage. approach the nearest medical center.
fallback.recomendation3: Please if you suffered any damage. approach the nearest medical center.
fallback.recomendation4: We recommend contacting the police as soon as possible to safeguard your integrity.
fallback.evidence: Do you want to attach any evidence?
fallback.pdfpath: You can download your report from:
fallback.dontworry: Ready, don't worry, your complaint has been registered and will be referred to the relevant entities
fallback.finish2: Chappy Police Man attended you, I hope I helped you. Have a nice day.
